name: Walsh, Appellant, v. Philadelphia School District

judges: Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.
parties: Walsh, Appellant, v. Philadelphia School District.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Rhodes. Costs to be paid by the School District of Philadelphia.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Wesley S. Caldwell, with him Abraham, Eoppelman, for appellant.
Franklin 8. Edmonds, with him C. Brewster Rhoads, Edward B. 8oken and J. Warren Brook, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Walsh, Appellant, v. Philadelphia School District.
Argued October 2, 1941.
Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.
Wesley S. Caldwell, with him Abraham, Eoppelman, for appellant.
Franklin 8. Edmonds, with him C. Brewster Rhoads, Edward B. 8oken and J. Warren Brook, for appellee.
November 24, 1941:
